title: Introducing ChatGPT Enterprise
summary: OpenAI has announced the launch of ChatGPT Enterprise, a version of its AI language model designed for businesses. The enterprise-grade platform offers enhanced security and privacy features, unlimited access to the GPT-4 model, longer context windows for processing longer inputs, advanced data analysis capabilities, customization options, and more. ChatGPT Enterprise has already been adopted by over 80% of Fortune 500 companies, with early users reporting increased productivity and improved performance. The platform is SOC 2 compliant and offers data encryption and management tools. OpenAI plans to introduce additional features and customization options in the future.
